#df['value'] = df['value'].astype(np.float16)

for s in df['state'].unique():
    v_period = df_agg[(df_agg['label']=='global') & (df_agg['state']==s)]['year']
    v_value  = df_agg[(df_agg['label']=='global') & (df_agg['state']==s)]['value']
    
    plt.plot(v_period, v_value)
    plt.xlabel('Year')
    plt.ylabel('Value')
    plt.title(f'State: {s}')
    plt.show()
